official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to accept the donation of the tract of land known as Fort Knox II and to add such tract to the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, if the Indiana Historical Society offers to donate a tract of land know as Fort Knox II, to accept such offer and to add and manage such tract as a part of the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to accept the donation of the tract of land known as Fort Knox II and to add such tract to the George Rogers Clark National Historical Park.
